name: Jenell S. Rouse
comment: Best shopping site out there and you get cash back on all your purchases.

name: Steven Sturgeon
comment: I have been buying from Shop.com for over 10 years. Great performance, shipping and product fuffillment

name: William Clark
comment: I love getting some of my spent money back in my pocket, and also save with coupons and deals.

name: John Forbes
comment: I love the options that the shop.com site offers, from different stores to buy at to setting a price alert, to finding the best price.

name: Dolores Trent
comment: I ordered the buy one get one free it took a month and a half to get to me. I paid 16 to have expedited shipping

name: Stacy E. Adams
comment: I like it that it's organic. I like the smell (which is very light) and the consistency of it. I would recommend it.
